column1: length at off stump, blocked on the front foot
pumps it out of the stadium! Length ball at off stump, skids on and rises a touch at off stump but he clears the front leg and swipes it high over midwicket
length on off stump, pushed into the covers on the front foot
falls short of long-on. Length on middle and leg. Looks to slog, gets it off the inside half and it lands safely
length on leg stump, tapped into the leg side off the front foot
length and slight shape outside off, blocked on the front foot
full and in at leg stump, flicked to midwicket
length and pushed through at off stump, tapped into the off side
length ball angled pushed down led side, swipes to deep midwicket
length outside off, angled bat push into the covers
length outside off, defended on the front foot
length outside off, driven with the angle to cover's right
dragged wide of long-on again. Slower ball at a length and he can't connect properly on this slog
length and just outside off, blocked on the front foot
inside edge down to fine leg. Pushes away from the body at an outswinger at a length outside off. Ball trickles past leg stump
just over midwicket. Another slower ball at a length. Swipes across the line and gets this off the toe-end. Just clears the fielder and deep midwicket cleans up
length ball just outside off, defended to point off the back foot
full and slanted in at off stump, plants the front leg across and flicks to mid-on
dropped short and in at leg stump. Stays deep in the crease, uses the angle and lifts this pull over the square leg boundary
length outside off, backs away and punches to mid-off
short and turning away from off, backs away and gets this punch back at the bowler who lets it through
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
length outside off, gets forward and flicks to long-on with the turn
length on middle stump, clubs across the line and gets it to deep midwicket on the bounce
slower ball at a length on off stump, defended to cover on the front foot
short and just outside off, gets on top of this and punches straight to extra cover where Balbirnie misfields
short of a length just outside off, waits for it to come on and short-arm pulls this to deep square
full outswinger just outside off, punched off the front foot to mid-off
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length and some shape away outside off, blocked on the front foot
over long-on. Full and floated in at leg stump. Allows it to land in his zone and drills it high over the fielder in the deep
length on off stump, hurriedly chops to mid-off
short of a length and turning away outside off. Stays leg side of it and chops it through cover with the turn
length and just outside off, backs away and slaps it wide of mid-off. No chance of stopping that
length and angled in at middle stump, pushed with the angle to midwicket
inside edge to short fine. Looks to block on the front foot but this comes in with the angle
length just outside off, leans in and flicks to midwicket
length and in at off stump, blocked solidly on the front foot
length just outside off, blocked on the front foot
length ball outside off, gets nicely forward and blocks on the front foot
short of a length just outside off, defended off the back foot
length at leg stump, looks to flick and cops it on the thigh guard
short ball down leg side, stays put and gets his bat around to tickle this fine past the keeper
length on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
shot! Lovely from Ahmadi. Short of a lenght just outside off, gets tall but not on the back foot as he whips this between midwicket and mid-on
length on off stump, defended don the back foot
length outside off, blocked on the front foot

was there an inside edge on that? No, says the umpire! Then it'll be interesting to see why he thinks that's not out. It looked plumb, dead in front. Length ball on off, angling. Looks to flick and is rapped right in front of middle stump
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
another stylish pull. Short of a length and some angle in at off stump. Springs up and pulls to the square leg boundary
full and just outside off, blocked off the inside half on the front foot
length and just outside off, blocked on the front foot
full outswinger outside off, gets on the front foot and drives firmly to mid-off
length and just outside off, gets behind the line and taps to mid-on
short of a length on leg stump, flicked to deep square off the back foot
short and just outside off, cuts on the front foot and can't beat backward point's dive to the right
length ball slanted in at leg stump, can't get bat on the flick
misfield at short fine. Length ball on leg stump, leans into the off side and flicks straight to the fielder who doesn't get low enough to stop this
length outside off, tapped into the covers
bouncer at leg stump, dug in too short and he leaves it alone
length on leg stump, flicked to short fine
full outside off, driven with the turn to long-on
length and in at leg stump. Drags with the angle to deep backward square
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
length outside off, defended on the front foot
length ball slides through at middle, tapped back to the bowler off the toe-end
length outside off, blocked to point off the front foot
full and floated up outside off, looks to drill through the cover, gets it to midwicket off the inside half
short of a length outside off, cut to sweeper cover
length outside off, allows it to land outside off, reaches out and gets under it before clubbing it high and wide over long-on. That brings up his maiden ODI fifty
much further this time! Length ball pushed flatter outside off this time, but he gets down on one knee and clobbers it with a slog sweep, into the back rows over long-on
just clears mid-off! Length ball fired fast across the batsman, who has a swish at this and gets it off the leading edge. No control, but safe
short of a length wide outside off, beaten on the cut
length on middle stump, punched towards long-on, can't beat midwicket
length at off stump, backs away and punches to long-on
past the outside edge. What a ball. Length and angled in at off stump. Looks to close the face on this as it zips past the edge and off stump
length and in at middle stump, backs away and punches hurriedly back to the bowler
length on leg stump, beaten on the inside edge as he gets forward to flick. Lbw appeal turned down. Another close one
short of a length just outside off, backs away and cuts through cover
length outside off, poked to extra cover
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
tossed up outside off, lifts it inside-out to sweeper's right
length on leg stump, swipes to deep backward square's left
short of a length just outside off, backs away and cuts
length outside off, lifts it over mid-off, on the up and off the outside half of the bat
length on middle stump, tapped to midwicket's left off the back foot
length on middle stump, flicked to deep square
length outside off, backs away and punches to long-off
length on middle stump, backs away and slices to extra cover
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
full on leg stump, flicked to midwicket's left

taken by slip! At long last, Ireland have managed to get a hand on one of his mis-hits. Length on middle stump, turning away. Looks for the slog sweep and gets a top edge that climbs feebly for the slip fielder to run behind and hold on
full on middle stump, flicked to deep square
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
full outside off, driven to long-off's left
length outside off, steps out and flicks to midwicket
full and in at leg stump, blocked on the front foot
straight to mid-on! Ahmadi looks to break the shackles but he doesn't go through with the shot. Full outside off. Steps out, meets it at the pitch but chips it straight to that man
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
length at off stump, defended off the back foot
length outside off, left alone
mix-up but they're safe. Length outside off, looks to flick, gets a leading edge that trickles towards mid-off and they stutter and stop as extra cover runs across and puts some doubt in their minds
length and lobbed up at off stump. Defended on the front foot
full on off stump, gets low and sweeps along the floor to deep square
length at middle stump, nudged through midwicket off the back foot
length on off stump blocked on the front foot
pushed into the leg side
full outside off, blocked on the front foot
length on off stump, defended down the pitch
short of a length just outside off, late cut straight to backward point
length on middle stump, flicked to midwicket
length on off stump, defended off the back foot
full on off stump, driven back to the bowler off the toe-end
full and down leg side, swiped to the long leg boundary with the angle. That was fired in too, he didn't need to do too much
length on leg stump, raps him on the pad as he gets forward to defend. Lbw appeal turned down
length on off stump, driven back to the bowler
length on leg stump, steps out and flicks to long-on
length ball ripping into off stump, tapped back to the bowler off the back foot
tossed up outside off, jammed to extra cover's right
length outside off, steps out and drives to long-on
length outside off, driven back to the bowler
full toss outside off, leans into this and punches firmly past extra cover off the front foot
tossed up full and wide outside off, leans in and whips his wrists to get this drive wide of mid-off
length on off stump, defended into the covers
full outside off, flicked back to the bowler
length on off stump, flicked to long-on with the turn
inside edge onto toe. Length ball sliding in at off and he can't get the punch through covers away
length on leg stump, blocked on the front foot
short of a length and fired in at off stump. Punched to sweeper cover
length at off stump, tapped back to the bowler off the back foot
length on off stump, punched to long-off
length on off stump, defended to point's left
overpitched and in at off stump. Punched back to the bowler off the front foot
length on off stump, defended off the back foot
short and just outside off, defended to point off the back foot
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length on middle stump, flicked to midwicket
short of a length just outside off, punched stylishly off the back foot. Backward flies to his left to stop and throws at the stumps. Hits them too, but they pick up a single off the rebound
length on middle stump, nudged to midwicket's right
length on middle stump, defended off the back foot
length on off stump, tapped back to the bowler
length at off stump, nudged back to the bowler
length at off, can't get the drive past the bowler
short of a length outside off, punched into the off side
short of a length on middle stump, flicked to midwicket
length outside off, tapped to point on the up
short of a length in the corridor, defended off the back foot

dropped! Balbirnie puts it down at gully. Short of a length just outside off, swishes outside the off stump and gets a thick edge that bursts through the hands as he looks to take it high to his right
short of a length and jumping up at off stump. Defended into the off side, with the thumb jamming into the handle
length on leg stump, flicked to mid-on's left
short ball, rocks back and pulls it hard over midwicket and it races to the deep midwicket fence
quicker one on middle, opens up and pushes it to mid-off's right for one
length, angling in, tucked away to squareleg
full outside off, pushed to cover
full on middle, has to play around the front pad a little, but safely negotiated
full on the pads, swept straight to short fine-leg
length outside off, left alone. Extra bounce through to the keeper
length on off, defended on the off side
length outside off, on his toes and punches it between cover and point. Didn't try to hit to hard, just timed it to perfection
length outside off, steered to point

short ball on middle, he has pulled that flat and hard towards deep backward squareleg where the fielder has to move quickly to his right, swoop down on the ball and push it back in play. But the third umpire reckons he had made contact with the boundary rope while doing so, it's called four
length outside off, steered to third-man
length, angling in and called wide
length on middle, defended
length on middle, goes back and opens up a little to push it through the covers for one
overpitched outside off and drilled through the covers, the deep cover does well to his left, times his dive and keeps the ball in play to restrict them to two
length on the pads, tries to improvise and scoop it over the short fine-leg but can't beat the man
full on off, defended
full on middle, dances down the wicket and drills it to long-on

he's dropped an absolute sitter at deep backward squareleg! swept, top edged high up in the air, the fielder had forever to get under it, maybe that was the problem and it burst through the fingers, which were pointing upwards
length outside off, pushed past point's left for two
length, angled in, tickled to short fine-leg
full on off, defended
length on middle, swept down to short fine-leg and they scamper one
full outside off, lunges forward and defends to cover
angled in on a length and he rocks back, opens up a little and picks it up to the deep midwicket fence
full on middle, defended
length outside off, rocks back and pushes it to deep cover
tossed up outside off, lunges forward and defends
full outside off and inside out over extra cover for four. That was hammered
full outside off, opens the face to push it to point
full outside off, pushed to long-off
length, drifting on to the pads, tucked away past squareleg for one
short outside off, cut away to deep point
full outside off, pushed back to the bowler, who does well to dive to his left to save the one
slower through the air, on a length, hint of turn, uses it to tuck it away to squareleg
full on off, pushed to cover
full on off, pushed to mid-off
length outside off, pushed to cover's left for one
length on middle, skips down the wicket but just pushes it to cover as it doesn't quite come on to the bat
slower ball on middle, pushed to long-on
full on middle, pushed to mid-on
length outside off, pushed to cover
quicker one on middle, pushed back to the bowler
length outside off, fired in, skips down and picks it up to deep cover. Wanted to go straighter, over extra cover
length outside off, pushed to cover's right and they scamper one
length on middle, goes down on one knee and hammers the sweep in front of square for four
length on middle, skips down and pushes it to cover's right for one
full on middle, tucked away to deep squareleg
length on off, defended
length outside off and lofted over mid-off, not from the middle of the bat but he only had to clear the man
length, angled in, tickled to fine-leg for one
length outside off, pushed to cover's right and they get through for a quick single
length on middle, pushed to long-on and that's his fifty
length on the pads, tucked away to deep squareleg
length outside off, pushed to point
length on middle, extra bounce surprises the batsman, but he does well to keep the bottom hand loose even as he failed to keep his eyes on the ball and drops it near his feet
full on off, pushed to mid-off
length on middle, pushed back to the bowler
length at the body, back away to open up the off side and steers it to point
short ball and beaten, hurried onto him as he tried to pull in front of square with his weight still forward
length outside off, and cut away delicately late, almost taking it from the keeper's gloves to beat point and the deep fielder
full on middle, defended
full outside off, pushed to cover
through him and that's a wicket they desperately needed! tossed up on a length, he just pushed down the wrong line and it burst through the gap between bat and pad to hit middle
down the wicket and picks it up over midwicket to get off the mark with four. Had to drag it a little from outside off and it was a bit of a thick inside edge but had enough behind it
overpitched outside off, makes a little room and drills it through extra cover, beating long-off to his left for another four. Incredible start to the innings
full on middle pushed back to the bowler
full on middle, skips down and hammers it back to the bowler, who does well to get a hand on it and mid-on cuts it off

dragged on that's the end of a frenetic innings! short outside off, innocuous delivery, made room and tried to blast it through the covers instead of just timing it and ended up inside edging it back on to his stumps
full on middle, pushed to long-on
full on middle, pushed to long-on
full on middle, shuffles across and pushes it to the diving midwicket's right for another single
full outside off, pushed to long-off
length on the pads. skips down the wicket and turns it around to deep squareleg
short on off, pushed to long-off
length on the pads, tucked away to deep squareleg
full, angled in, pushed to midwicket
tossed up on off, lunges forward and defends to cover
length on middle and leg, cramping him for room, pushed back to the bowler
length on the pads, turned around towards squareleg, the keeper retrieves
length on off, steered past point
length outside off, steered to third-man
full on middle, goes through the line, a bit of a leading edge, but all he had to do was clear mid-off, ends up clearing the ropes
length and angled in, extra bounce, but Nabi rides it well and drops it near his feet
full toss on the pads, helped along the ground to fine-leg. Could have done better with that, it was a freebie
full on middle, pushed to long-on
length on middle, swivels and helps it along to deep squareleg
length outside off, opens the face but can't beat cover-point, who does well with a timely dive to his left
length on off, pushed to cover-point
slower ball, short outside off, he slashes and bisects point and short third-man for four
nearly chipped to cover! length outside off, he was early into the shot and the ball held up in the surface as well, but luckily, just wide of the diving cover fielder
length on middle, defended
short one on middle, hurries through, tries to ramp it over the keeper but made that decision too late and misses
length on middle, cramping him, pushed to cover
length on middle, not giving him any room to go through the off side, awkwardly defended back to the bowler
length outside off, pushed to deep cover's left for two
length, angling in, gets a leg bye towards squareleg
full and wide, drilled to deep cover
fired in on middle, pushed back to the bowler
full toss and dealt with! Goes sailing over long-on
tossed up outside off, opens the face to push it to deep point and retain strike
length on middle, pushed to long-on
length outside off, past the diving bowler to long-off for one
tossed up, top edged and taken at long-on! He tried to go over deep midwicket, went high up in the air but taken comfortably
full on middle, pushed to the bowler's left, who does well to dive and stop the single
length on middle, down the wicket and pushed to midwicket
fired in on the pads, tucked away to squareleg
length on the pads, tucked away to short fine-leg's right for one
tossed up on middle, defended
length outside off, pushed to deep cover
length, angled in, tucked away to short fine-leg's right and that's fifty for Shahidi
full on off, pushed to long-off
length on off, pushed to long-on
length on middle, an ugly hoick to the leg side, but no timing, trickles away along the ground to deep squareleg
short ball and picked up to the deep midwicket, one bounce to the fielder
short ball, swatted away to deep squareleg but that hurried onto him, caught the splice and straight down deep squareleg's throat
length outside off, steered to point
short one, surprises Rashid, but ducks under it
length outside off, tentative poke and beaten
length on middle, defended
down the wicket and stumped! Saw him coming down early, shortened his length, and it went under his bat as he attempted to heave it, well collected by the keeper
quicker one middle, pushed to midwicket
length outside off, pushed to cover
length on middle, pushed to midwicket
big appeal for lbw but probably sliding down!
length on middle, whipped away to deep squareleg
full on off, pushed to cover and they scamper one even as the fielder comes charging in, swoops down on the ball and under-arms it to the striker's end
short one outside off, tries to drag it to the leg side and misses
full on the pads, clipped to deep midwicket
short on middle, pulled away to deep squareleg for one
slower ball on off, makes room and pushes it to point for a quick single
down the wicket, shortens his length, Rashid adjusts and pushes it towards the vacant midwicket region
fired in on middle, down the wicket and pushes it to long-on
full outside off, squeezed to point
length on middle, pushed to cover
attempted reverse sweep, struck on the thigh pad
fired in on middle, pushed to long-on
length on the pads, tucked away to fine-leg
yorker outside off, squeezed away to short third-man
short on middle and he has hammered that over the deep midwicket fence
